content: The charts look about up to par. Prosperous during the Republicans terms in power and "losers" while the Dumbs have control.

content: Time for the 'haves' to pull their money out of all financial institutions and help them along. Bury it in your mattress so they can't 'gamble' it away on bad loans, and then you'll actually have cash to deal with when the economy collapses in spite of throwing billions at it. You may not earn interest, but everyone should be MORE interested in keeping it out of the 'Dumbs' hands... and tax-free... And don't worry, Obama will fix everything if it takes every dime we have! ;-)
